expo.name: Color Fashion Wheel
expo.description: Transform your fashion sense with AI-powered color analysis. Extract colors from photos, create stunning color collages, discover perfect outfit combinations, and share your style inspiration with our interactive color wheel technology.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera to capture outfits and colors.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photos so you can pick images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We save your collages and palettes to your library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We use the microphone only when recording videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your camera to capture colors from clothing and surroundings.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your photos to extract colors for analysis.
